import React from "react"; import Logo from "./Logo"; import Sidebar from "./SideBar"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useData } from "./Data"; // instead of importing each of the products like this import { doorBells, doorLocks, lightings, speakers, thermostats } from "./Data"; we can import all of them in one go like this import { useData } from "./Data"; const ProductForm = () => { const [productId, setProductId] = useState(""); const [type, setType] = useState(""); const [productName, setProductName] = useState(""); const [productPrice, setProductPrice] = useState(""); const [productImage, setProductImage] = useState(""); const [productManufacturer, setProductManufacturer] = useState(""); const [productCondition, setProductCondition] = useState(""); const [productDiscount, setProductDiscount] = useState(""); const [product, setProduct] = useState(""); const { doorBells,setDoorBells, doorLocks, lightings, speakers, thermostats } = useData(); //here we can access all the products from the useData hook const formStyle = { margin: "20px", }; const inputStyle = { width: "100%", padding: "8px", margin: "5px 0", boxSizing: "border-box", }; const buttonStyle = { float: "right", height: "20px", margin: "20px", marginRight: "10px", }; const handleForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const productData = { id: productId, name: productName, price: productPrice, image: productImage, manufacturer: productManufacturer, condition: productCondition, discount: productDiscount, type: type, }; set console.log(productData); }; return (

); }; export default ProductForm;
